name: HTC Vive controller
description:
Official 3D CAD file for the HTC Vive Controller (Free downloadable) http://community.viveport.com/t5/General-Vive-Discussion/Does-anyone-have-a-3D-model-of-the-controller-for-invenor/m-p/2839
This is the Official 3D CAD file posted on the “Vive Developers Community” in STL and STP file formats, I have developed the mesh conversion to OBJ file format and units setup in Centimeter in Autodesk 3Ds MAX to be able for work in any 3d software platform.
NOTE: The 3D model surface errors are due to file source failure not by conversion process, which can be verified by downloading and check the original files.

Developed by Marco Romero 3D Design Studio, licensed under CC Attribution. (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
